I found a CD Key on the web (it was just a lot of A's Example: AAAAAAAAAAAAA) But it still says "unable to load authentication library, exiting..." and i dont know how to run it as admin. I'll try to re-install it. But thanks anyway.

@Puhapio
Right click on icon of the main half life launcher, click properties, click compatability tab, and tick the administatve privlages box
I have windows 7, I can't put resolution more than 1024x768 (even if max should be 13.. x 768), how to fix that ? + I can't find any server online (firewall is off)

For those who got:

"unable to load authentication library, exiting..."
right click & Properties the shortcut add :(space)-gl
eg(in the target box): .............Half-Lifehl.exe" -gl
